data.name: Gionee M6-Champagne (64GB)
data.description: The Gionee M6 delivers everything you need for a fantastic mobile phone experience, all at a price that does not hurt. Featuring a 5.5 inch HD display that's perfect for reading ebooks, watching videos and viewing media, the M6 also boasts a 5000mAh battery that will carry you through a full day's operation. The combination of a octa-core processor and Amigo 3.5 based on Android 6.0 OS, and a 4GB RAM that makes multi-tasking on the Gionee M6 a pleasure.
data.short_description: The Gionee M6 delivers everything you need for a fantastic mobile phone experience, all at a price that does not hurt
data.specifications:
• Display: 5.5 -1920 x 100
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Octa Core
  • Memory: 4GB RAM; 64GB ROM (expandable via microSD)
  • Operating System: Amigo 3.5 based on Android 6.0
  • Camera: 13MP (Rear); 8MP (Front)
  • Battery: 5000 mAh
  • Network: Wifi, Bluetooth
  • Colour: Champagne

data.name: Gionee S6s - Mocha Gold
data.description: Flash a SmileLove to take selfies? Then the S6s is the perfect choice for you. Armed with 2 front flashes – the CRI flash and a screen flash – the S6s ensures that you always shine out. And outshine. Beauty with BrainsBeauty lies in the hands of the S6s holder, with the Face Beauty 2.0 feature. It does an intelligent analysis and naturally beautifies selfies, ensuring that you look your best. Always.Best Face ForwardLove experimenting with your looks? Now get creative with your selfies as well. The Live Filter feature gives you 8 filters to choose from, for that picture-perfect look
data.short_description: Flash a SmileLove to take selfies? Then the S6s is the perfect choice for you.
data.specifications:
• 13MP primary camera 
  • 8MP front camera
  • 13.97 centimeters (5.5-inch) IPS capacitive touchscreen with 1080 x 1920 pixels resolution 
  • Android 6.0 Marshmallow
  • Fingerprint Sensor enabled
  • Operating system with 1.3GHz MediaTek MT6753 octa core processor
  • 3GB RAM + 32GB ROM expandable up to 128GB 
  • Dual SIM dual-standby - 4G LTE
  • 3150mAH non-removable lithium-ion battery 
  • 1 year manufacturer warranty for device

data.name: Setro Ribony Leather Loafers - Black
data.description: RIBONY BLACK  is a perfect casual moccasin shoe that soothes your feet while giving you a perfect finishing on your entire casual wears. It comes in a perfect blend of plain black and a red ribbon strapped to the front panel of the shoe to create the petal touch that makes sense. The finishing of this shoe is done in such a way to comply with the casual shoe pattern that can be very easy to maintain as it does not need polish, as only the use of duster will do the trick.
data.short_description: RIBONY BLACK  is a perfect casual moccasin shoe that soothes your feet while giving you a perfect finishing on your entire casual wears.
data.specifications:
• Black Leather
  • Easy to carry Flat sole
  • Perfect finishing
  • Easy to maintain
